dhatNyeng
3 Jurus Sakti Instalasi Software Linux
Jul 06 2007

just simply

./configure

make

make install

jika hasil compile-an ingin berada dipath tertentu bisa dengan prefix.

./configure --prefix=/path/tertentu/

have fun and enjoy !!!!
